revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: From 18 golden solidi 432 keratia.;Strategios, son of Lampros: 93 1/2 keratia;Leontios, son of Lampros: 66 keratia;The heirs of Leontios, son of . . .: 44 keratia;The heirs of Philoxenos, son of Ger(--): 24 keratia;Theodoulos, stone-cutter: 22 1/2 1/4 1/8 keratia;Diogenes and Makrobios: 22 1/2 1/4 1/8 keratia;The heirs of Johannes, son of . . .: 86 keratia;Papias and Ta[- - -]: 19 1/2 1/4 keratia;The heirs of Ptoleminos: 46 1/2 keratia;Philoxenos, son of Isak: 6 1/2 1/4 keratia

listBibl.bibl: Sijpesteijn PJ, PMich XV, 737, 1982, Pl. XXVII -- L. 8: the small fragment bearing the letters kle (see pl. XXVII) is now missing, so that its positioning cannot be checked. L. 9: read 19 1/2 1/4, instead of 19 1/2. (PH)
